thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Sead Kolasinac to make decision 'soon' says agent | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Sead Kolasinac to make decision 'soon' says agent | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Sead Kolasinac to make decision 'soon' says agent | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 11:03 am Sead Kolasinac will decide his future soon (Picture: TF-Images/Getty Images) 
Chelsea target Sead Kolasinac will make a decision regarding his future in the near future, his agent has confirmed. Antoine Griezmann breaks silence over Manchester United transfer speculation 
The 23-year-old is out of contract in the summer, with Tottenham Hotspur, Juventus and Inter Milan all believed to be challenging Antonio Conte’s side for his signature. 
Schalke confirmed Chelsea made an enquiry for him in January, which was promptly dismissed, but his future remains in the balance as he’s available on a free transfer at the end of the season. 
The Bundesliga side have offered Kolasinac a new bumper deal in an attempt to keep him at the Veltins-Arena, with sporting executive Christian Heidel encouraging the wing-back to make a ‘timely decision’ to ensure he focuses for the remainder of the campaign.
